@Lloyd McKenzie @Vassil Peytchev one of our connectathon participants would like to search for the original task that the disagreement is about. We are using Task.reasonReference to point to the original correction request task. However, there is no search parameter for that. Do we

  • not bother (they can search wihout using parameter
  • extend search extension on Task in the IG
  • lobby for the search param to be added to Task in a future FHIR version
You'd want to define a custom search parameter in the IG - and propose a standard one be defined in R5. So 2nd and 3rd bullet points.
I had two bucks riding on you answering 2nd and 3rd.
